title: I Want To Become a Beautiful Girl, Be Spoiled, and Live Life on Easy Mode! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Shoujo Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Male to Female   Modern Day   Showbiz   Time Travel   Transmigration
author: Akaba Renga   紅葉煉瓦
description:
When he begged Santa-san within his dreams 「I want to become a beautiful girl, be spoiled, and live life on easy mode!」, he was reincarnated as【Kurone Koyoi】.

Her wish was granted and she began her second life as a beautiful girl. But even though she got this rare chance at reincarnation, due to her innate communication disorder and laziness, she couldn’t succeed at anything and wasted ten years of her life.

When Kurone Koyoi realized the danger she was in of losing her easy mode due to her worsening communication disorder, she used those feelings and spirit to apply for the audition of the second generation of the Vtuber group【Arutema】in order to improve her condition.

And so, while being a beautiful girl, she took the form of a virtual being and became active as【Kuroneko San】!

This is the tale of a useless beautiful girl who will get flamed, flirt, get flamed, be spoiled, and grow as a person.>
